sentences.sContent: Are high school and college athletes being slipped illegal recreational and performance-enhancing drugs by their coaches and trainers?
sentences.sContent_eng: Are high school and college athletes being slipped illegal recreational and performance-enhancing drugs by their coaches and trainers?
sentences.sCn: 是否高中和大学运动员正在被他们的教练和训练员不断提供非法娱乐和性能增强的药物呢？

sentences.sContent: When doing so, you'll use some performance-enhancing mount options to squeeze the last ounce of performance out of your new filesystem
sentences.sContent_eng: When doing so, you'll use some performance-enhancing mount options to squeeze the last ounce of performance out of your new filesystem
sentences.sCn: 挂装时，您将使用一些性能增强 mount 选项来最大程度地发掘出（或发挥出）您的新文件系统的性能。
